original_text: But God sent me to come here before you. Because of that, your family would stay alive. God would do a great thing to save you and your descendants.
korean_text: 하나님이 큰 구원으로 당신들의 생명을 보존하고 당신들의 후손을 세상에 두시려고 나를 당신들보다 먼저 보내셨나니

sentences.original_text: But God sent me to come here before you.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 하나님께서 나를 당신보다 먼저 여기로 보내셨습니다.

sentences.original_text: Because of that, your family would stay alive.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 때문에 당신의 가족은 살아남을 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: God would do a great thing
to save you and your descendants.
